title: Conformal Prediction Sets with Improved Conditional Coverage using Trust Scores
details: JN Kaur, MI Jordan, A Alaa - arXiv preprint arXiv:2501.10139, 2025
abstract: Standard conformal prediction offers a marginal guarantee on coverage, but for prediction sets to be truly useful, they should ideally ensure coverage conditional on each test point. Unfortunately, it is impossible to achieve exact, distribution-free …
